name: Brotherhood (Quick Demo)
description:
Quick Trial of the full game.

Full game link: https://soz4820.itch.io/brotherhood

Brotherhood is a puzzle game that I'm working on. In this game, the player needs to control multi-characters at once and combine their abilities to be able to solve the puzzle.

Do you have an idea for our game? Click on the survey and tell us what you think! We made this survey to research community preference, and also to improve our gameplay by listening to players and community opinions.

Survey Link: https://forms.gle/QAdWyTnVyzucHHQn9
